item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-12
item.description: Locket, an app for sharing photos to friendsâ€™ homescreens, hits the top of the App Store (5 minute read) Locket is an app that turns Apple’s widget system into a private social networking platform.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-04-20
item.description: Microsoft’s ‘Netflix-for-gaming’ service launches on iPhone and PC this week (2 minute read) Microsoft’s Xbox Cloud Gaming service will roll out in beta on iOS and PCs this week.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-02-11
item.description: Facebook is reportedly working on a Clubhouse copy (1 minute read) Facebook is in the early stages of developing a Clubhouse clone.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-29
item.description: Apple vs. Epic hearing previews a long, hard-fought trial to come (3 minute read) Epic’s request for a temporary injunction in its case against Apple was heard recently.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-10
item.description: Google confirms new Nest smart speaker with official photo and video (1 minute read) Google has confirmed that it is working on a new Nest smart speaker.
